segments.text: I see this cozy kitchen with a woman standing by the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's carefully drying a plate with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window above the sink shows a nice garden outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But wait, the faucet is running full blast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is overflowing from the sink onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got one foot in the puddle and doesn't even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over on the left, there's a boy on a stool reaching into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A little girl is standing there with her hand out, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're sneaking cookies behind the woman's back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are open, and cookies are spilling out a bit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she's so focused on that plate amid all this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
